name: A super AWESOME platformer!
description:
A rich Role Playing Game in which you have to save a world corrupted by liars. Enemies aren't what they seem, trees don't grant wood. At least the villagers seems to be trustworthy and willing to help you, right? Can you trust them?

Features:
- A rich environment filled with friendly NPCs, enemies and endemic life.
- 8 different skills to unlock and 14 weapons and 9 armors to craft.
- 3 bosses to test your skills.
- An engaging storyline.
- Lies all around, although this description is true, I swear!

This game was created for the Community GameJam with the help of Rafael Navarro (https://rafaelnavarro.itch.io/)

A controller is required to play this game.
